DOC.brief_summary: Tryptophan metabolism in kidney disease will be investigated in patients with chronic kidney disease stages (ADOQI 3-5). Tryptophan levels and respective catabolites will be assessed under hemodialysis.
DOC.criteria: Chronic kidney disease (for > 3months) stages (National Kidney foundation/ADOQI): 35 Signs of infection or systemic inflammation
DOC.keyword: Assessment of tryptophan and tryptophan catabolites and IDO-activity in patients with chronic kidney disease
